animeTitle: Sensei no Ojikan: Doki Doki School Hours OVA
animeDescription: The series is centered on 27-year-old homeroom teacher Mika Suzuki (who only looks about half her age) and the eccentric and colorful students of her class. (Source: Wikipedia)
